key.name: auto-process-datasets
key.description: If True, new datasets will be automatically processed using the AutoProcess server.

key.name: directory-template
key.description: The template to be used for creating directories. use '{varname}' syntax to use variable substitution. Available variables include {session}, {group}, {sample}, {task}, and {date}. Initial slash will be ignored. Only the characters AaBbCcDdEeFfGgHhIiJjKkLlMmNnOoPpQqRrSsTtUuVvWwXxYyZz0123456789-_ are allowed.

key.name: default-dataset-strategy
key.description: The default strategy to be used for data collection.
